DOC.brief_summary: Multicentric , prospective , non-interventional observational study two part : 1 . A register quality assurance within recertification clinic 2 . An extended register scientific protocol .
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Quality assurance As quality-assuring basic register , CPU II register check extent certify Chest Pain Units fulfill criterion publish DGK . In particular , follow quality dimension evaluate : - Indication quality - Diagnostic quality - Therapeutic quality - Structural quality / network 2 . Platform project scientific focus The CPU II register infrastructure provide platform project scientific question ( scientific protocol = WP ) : WP : Clinical history CPU ( PCI data / discharge / 12-month FUP ) patient lead cardiac diagnosis
